definition: He had to abandon his plans when the storm hit.
translation:
Iwan
Kasingkahulugan: talikuran, pabayaan, isuko
Kasalungat: panatilihin, ingatan, yakapin
Halimbawa: Kinailangan niyang iwan ang kanyang mga plano nang dumating ang bagyo.
usage: In context, 'Abandon' can be used like this: He had to abandon his plans when the storm hit.

definition: The law was abolished after it was deemed unjust.
translation:
Alisin (Pawiin)
Kasingkahulugan: burahin, alisin, kanselahin
Kasalungat: itatag, likhain, panatilihin
Halimbawa: Inalis ang batas matapos itong ideklarang hindi makatarungan.
usage: In context, 'Abolish' can be used like this: The law was abolished after it was deemed unjust.

definition: The sponge will absorb all the water from the spill.
translation:
Sumipsip
Kasingkahulugan: sumipsip, tanggapin, lamunin
Kasalungat: ilabas, pakawalan, palabasin
Halimbawa: Sisisipsipin ng espongha ang lahat ng tubig sa natapon.
usage: In context, 'Absorb' can be used like this: The sponge will absorb all the water from the spill.

definition: The region is abundant in natural resources.
translation:
Masagana
Kasingkahulugan: marami, sagana, labis
Kasalungat: kulang, limitado, kapos
Halimbawa: Sagana ang rehiyon sa likas na yaman.
usage: In context, 'Abundant' can be used like this: The region is abundant in natural resources.

definition: The car started to accelerate as we drove downhill.
translation:
Pabilisin
Kasingkahulugan: pabilisin, paharapin, magmadali
Kasalungat: pabagalin, huminto, ipagpaliban
Halimbawa: Nagsimulang pabilisin ng kotse ang takbo pababa ng burol.
usage: In context, 'Accelerate' can be used like this: The car started to accelerate as we drove downhill.

definition: The library is accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities.
translation:
Madaling Mapuntahan
Kasingkahulugan: maabot, makuha, magamit
Kasalungat: hindi maabot, sarado, harang
Halimbawa: Madaling mapuntahan ng lahat ang aklatan, kabilang ang may kapansanan.
usage: In context, 'Accessible' can be used like this: The library is accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities.

definition: She managed to accomplish all her goals for the year.
translation:
Matupad
Kasingkahulugan: makamit, matapos, maganap
Kasalungat: mabigo, mapalampas, pabayaan
Halimbawa: Nagawa niyang matupad ang lahat ng kanyang mga layunin sa taon.
usage: In context, 'Accomplish' can be used like this: She managed to accomplish all her goals for the year.

definition: The test results were accurate and showed no errors.
translation:
Tumpak
Kasingkahulugan: tama, eksakto, wasto
Kasalungat: mali, hindi tama, malabo
Halimbawa: Tumpak ang mga resulta ng pagsusuri at walang mali.
usage: In context, 'Accurate' can be used like this: The test results were accurate and showed no errors.

definition: She struggled to find a balance between work and personal life.
translation:
Balanse
Kasingkahulugan: pagkakapantay, katatagan, simetriya
Kasalungat: kawalan ng balanse, kawalang-tatag, hindi pagkakatugma
Halimbawa: Nahirapan siyang hanapin ang balanse sa pagitan ng trabaho at personal na buhay.
usage: In context, 'Balance' can be used like this: She struggled to find a balance between work and personal life.

definition: The king decided to banish the traitor from the kingdom.
translation:
Itaboy
Kasingkahulugan: ipatapon, paalisin, palayasin
Kasalungat: tanggapin, anyayahan, papasukin
Halimbawa: Nagpasya ang hari na itaboy ang taksil mula sa kaharian.
usage: In context, 'Banish' can be used like this: The king decided to banish the traitor from the kingdom.

definition: The bare walls of the room made it feel cold and empty.
translation:
Hubad
Kasingkahulugan: walang takip, lantad, hubo
Kasalungat: may damit, natatakpan, protektado
Halimbawa: Ang hubad na mga pader ng silid ay nagbigay dito ng malamig na pakiramdam.
usage: In context, 'Bare' can be used like this: The bare walls of the room made it feel cold and empty.

definition: The benevolent king always helped the poor.
translation:
Mapagkawanggawa
Kasingkahulugan: mabait, maawain, matulungin
Kasalungat: malupit, masama, walang puso
Halimbawa: Ang mapagkawanggawang hari ay laging tumutulong sa mahihirap.
usage: In context, 'Benevolent' can be used like this: The benevolent king always helped the poor.

definition: The brave firefighter ran into the burning building to rescue the family.
translation:
Matapang
Kasingkahulugan: walang takot, magiting, matibay ang loob
Kasalungat: duwag, mahina ang loob, natatakot
Halimbawa: Ang matapang na bumbero ay pumasok sa nasusunog na gusali upang iligtas ang pamilya.
usage: In context, 'Brave' can be used like this: The brave firefighter ran into the burning building to rescue the family.

definition: The soup was too bland for my taste; it needed more seasoning.
translation:
Maputla
Kasingkahulugan: matabang, walang lasa, walang sigla
Kasalungat: malasa, maanghang, masigla
Halimbawa: Masyadong maputla ang sabaw para sa panlasa ko; kailangan pa ng pampalasa.
usage: In context, 'Bland' can be used like this: The soup was too bland for my taste; it needed more seasoning.

definition: They spent a blissful weekend in the mountains.
translation:
Masaya
Kasingkahulugan: maligaya, kuntento, masigla
Kasalungat: malungkot, balisa, nagdadalamhati
Halimbawa: Nagtamasa sila ng masayang weekend sa kabundukan.
usage: In context, 'Blissful' can be used like this: They spent a blissful weekend in the mountains.

background: Origin: Scandinavian 'blunt', dull or blunt edge
definition: Her blunt response to the criticism surprised everyone in the room.
translation:
Diretso
Kasingkahulugan: prangka, tapat, walang paligoy
Kasalungat: maingat, diplomatikong, maselan
Halimbawa: Ang prangka niyang sagot sa puna ay ikinagulat ng lahat sa silid.
usage: In context, 'Blunt' can be used like this: Her blunt response to the criticism surprised everyone in the room.

definition: The meeting lasted for hours and really started to bore me.
translation:
Nakakainip
Kasingkahulugan: nakakapagod, nakakaantok, walang sigla
Kasalungat: nakakaaliw, nakakatawa, interesante
Halimbawa: Napakatagal ng pulong at talagang nakakainip.
usage: In context, 'Bore' can be used like this: The meeting lasted for hours and really started to bore me.

background: Origin: Scandinavian, meaning sharp or biting
definition: She took a brisk walk in the park to get some fresh air.
translation:
Masigla
Kasingkahulugan: maliksi, mabilis, buhay na buhay
Kasalungat: mabagal, matamlay, tamad
Halimbawa: Naglakad siya nang masigla sa parke para makalanghap ng sariwang hangin.
usage: In context, 'Brisk' can be used like this: She took a brisk walk in the park to get some fresh air.

definition: The bitter argument left both of them upset and frustrated.
translation:
Mapait
Kasingkahulugan: marahas, masakit, may hinanakit
Kasalungat: matamis, magaan, maganda
Halimbawa: Ang mapait na pagtatalo ay nagdulot ng sama ng loob sa magkabilang panig.
usage: In context, 'Bitter' can be used like this: The bitter argument left both of them upset and frustrated.

definition: Bigotry has no place in a society that values equality.
translation:
Pagkapanatiko
Kasingkahulugan: pagkiling, pagtatangi, diskriminasyon
Kasalungat: pagiging bukas, pagtanggap, katarungan
Halimbawa: Walang lugar ang pagkapanatiko sa lipunang nagmamahal sa pagkakapantay-pantay.
usage: In context, 'Bigotry' can be used like this: Bigotry has no place in a society that values equality.

background: Origin: Scottish, meaning to check or repel
definition: She was baffled by the strange behavior of her friend.
translation:
Nalito
Kasingkahulugan: naguluhan, nagtataka, nagtaka
Kasalungat: tiyak, malinaw, sigurado
Halimbawa: Nalito siya sa kakaibang asal ng kanyang kaibigan.
usage: In context, 'Baffled' can be used like this: She was baffled by the strange behavior of her friend.

background: Origin: Latin 'benevolentia', desire to do good
definition: His acts of benevolence made him beloved by all.
translation:
Kabaitan
Kasingkahulugan: kagandahang-loob, kabutihan, pagkamaawain
Kasalungat: kalupitan, kasamaan, pagiging makasarili
Halimbawa: Ang kanyang kabaitan ay minahal ng lahat.
usage: In context, 'Benevolence' can be used like this: His acts of benevolence made him beloved by all.

definition: The glass vase was brittle and broke into pieces with the slightest touch.
translation:
Marupok
Kasingkahulugan: madaling mabasag, mahina, maramdamin
Kasalungat: matibay, matatag, matigas
Halimbawa: Ang basong iyon ay marupok at agad nabasag nang mahulog.
usage: In context, 'Brittle' can be used like this: The glass vase was brittle and broke into pieces with the slightest touch.

definition: The scientist's brilliant discovery changed the field forever.
translation:
Matalino
Kasingkahulugan: magaling, mahusay, henyo
Kasalungat: bobo, mahina, walang alam
Halimbawa: Ang matalinong tuklas ng siyentipiko ay nagbago ng larangan magpakailanman.
usage: In context, 'Brilliant' can be used like this: The scientist's brilliant discovery changed the field forever.

definition: The harvest provided a bounty of fruits and vegetables.
translation:
Kasaganaan
Kasingkahulugan: kayamanan, kasapatan, kasiyahan
Kasalungat: kakulangan, kakapusan, paghihirap
Halimbawa: Ang aning ito ay nagdala ng kasaganaan ng prutas at gulay.
usage: In context, 'Bounty' can be used like this: The harvest provided a bounty of fruits and vegetables.

definition: The blaze of the campfire kept us warm on the cold night.
translation:
Apoy
Kasingkahulugan: siga, liyab, alab
Kasalungat: puksain, patayin, apulahin
Halimbawa: Ang apoy ng bonfire ang nagbigay-init sa malamig na gabi.
usage: In context, 'Blaze' can be used like this: The blaze of the campfire kept us warm on the cold night.

background: Origin: Scottish, to check or repel
definition: The magician's trick completely baffled the audience.
translation:
Malito
Kasingkahulugan: maguluhan, malabuan, mabigla
Kasalungat: malinawan, maunawaan, masimplihan
Halimbawa: Lubos na nalito ang mga tao sa mahikang ipinakita ng salamangkero.
usage: In context, 'Baffle' can be used like this: The magician's trick completely baffled the audience.

definition: The two men got into a brawl outside the bar.
translation:
Gulo
Kasingkahulugan: suntukan, sagupaan, alitan
Kasalungat: kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, katahimikan
Halimbawa: Nagkaroon ng gulo sa labas ng bar dahil sa dalawang lalaki.
usage: In context, 'Brawl' can be used like this: The two men got into a brawl outside the bar.

definition: The future looks bright for young professionals in this field.
translation:
Maliwanag
Kasingkahulugan: maningning, makintab, kumikislap
Kasalungat: madilim, mapusyaw, walang ilaw
Halimbawa: Maliwanag ang kinabukasan ng mga kabataang propesyonal sa larangang ito.
usage: In context, 'Bright' can be used like this: The future looks bright for young professionals in this field.

definition: He made a huge blunder during the presentation by forgetting his key points.
translation:
Pagkakamali
Kasingkahulugan: error, pagkukulang, pagkadulas
Kasalungat: tagumpay, tama, katuparan
Halimbawa: Nagkaroon siya ng malaking pagkakamali sa presentasyon nang makalimutan ang mahahalagang punto.
usage: In context, 'Blunder' can be used like this: He made a huge blunder during the presentation by forgetting his key points.

definition: His bizarre behavior left everyone in the office confused.
translation:
Kakaiba
Kasingkahulugan: pambihira, hindi karaniwan, nakapagtataka
Kasalungat: normal, karaniwan, pangkaraniwan
Halimbawa: Ang kakaibang kilos niya ay nakagulat sa lahat sa opisina.
usage: In context, 'Bizarre' can be used like this: His bizarre behavior left everyone in the office confused.

definition: The breezy afternoon made the beach a perfect spot to relax.
translation:
Mahangin
Kasingkahulugan: presko, maaliwalas, may simoy
Kasalungat: kalmado, walang hangin, tahimik
Halimbawa: Ang mahangin na hapon ay perpekto para magpahinga sa tabing-dagat.
usage: In context, 'Breezy' can be used like this: The breezy afternoon made the beach a perfect spot to relax.

definition: The road was bumpy, making the ride uncomfortable.
translation:
Lubak-lubak
Kasingkahulugan: hindi pantay, magaspang, mabundok
Kasalungat: makinis, pantay, maayos
Halimbawa: Lubak-lubak ang kalsada kaya hindi komportable ang biyahe.
usage: In context, 'Bumpy' can be used like this: The road was bumpy, making the ride uncomfortable.

definition: The new advertising campaign helped boost sales.
translation:
Palakasin
Kasingkahulugan: dagdagan, paunlarin, pataasin
Kasalungat: bawasan, pahinain, pababain
Halimbawa: Ang bagong kampanya sa marketing ay nakatulong para palakasin ang benta.
usage: In context, 'Boost' can be used like this: The new advertising campaign helped boost sales.

definition: His bold decision to start a new business paid off in the end.
translation:
Matapang
Kasingkahulugan: walang takot, palaban, mapangahas
Kasalungat: mahina, duwag, matatakutin
Halimbawa: Ang matapang niyang desisyon na magsimula ng negosyo ay nagbunga ng tagumpay.
usage: In context, 'Bold' can be used like this: His bold decision to start a new business paid off in the end.

definition: The bashful child hid behind his mother when meeting strangers.
translation:
Mahiyain
Kasingkahulugan: mailap, tahimik, mahina ang loob
Kasalungat: palakaibigan, kumpiyansa, matapang
Halimbawa: Ang mahiyain na bata ay nagtago sa likod ng kanyang ina nang makilala ang bagong tao.
usage: In context, 'Bashful' can be used like this: The bashful child hid behind his mother when meeting strangers.

background: Origin: English 'beam', a ray of light
definition: She walked into the room with a beaming smile on her face.
translation:
Nakangiti
Kasingkahulugan: masigla, maliwanag, masaya
Kasalungat: malungkot, matamlay, seryoso
Halimbawa: Pumasok siya sa silid na may nakangiting mukha.
usage: In context, 'Beaming' can be used like this: She walked into the room with a beaming smile on her face.

definition: The garden produced a bountiful harvest this year.
translation:
Masagana
Kasingkahulugan: marami, sagana, mapagbigay
Kasalungat: kulang, kakaunti, limitado
Halimbawa: Ang hardin ay nagbunga ng masaganang ani ngayong taon.
usage: In context, 'Bountiful' can be used like this: The garden produced a bountiful harvest this year.

definition: The brutal truth was hard to hear but necessary.
translation:
Malupit
Kasingkahulugan: marahas, walang awa, brutal
Kasalungat: mabait, maawain, banayad
Halimbawa: Mahirap tanggapin ang malupit na katotohanan, ngunit ito ay kailangan.
usage: In context, 'Brutal' can be used like this: The brutal truth was hard to hear but necessary.

background: Origin: English 'friend', a person one knows well
definition: He tried to befriend the new student by offering help with her homework.
translation:
Makipagkaibigan
Kasingkahulugan: tumulong, sumuporta, makisama
Kasalungat: lumaban, tumanggi, kontrahin
Halimbawa: Sinubukan niyang makipagkaibigan sa bagong estudyante sa pamamagitan ng pagtulong sa takdang-aralin.
usage: In context, 'Befriend' can be used like this: He tried to befriend the new student by offering help with her homework.

definition: They lived in bliss for many years after their wedding.
translation:
Kaligayahan
Kasingkahulugan: saya, tuwa, kasiyahan
Kasalungat: kalungkutan, dalamhati, pighati
Halimbawa: Nabuhay sila sa kaligayahan matapos ang kanilang kasal.
usage: In context, 'Bliss' can be used like this: They lived in bliss for many years after their wedding.

definition: He gave the door a bash with the hammer, trying to fix it.
translation:
Hampas
Kasingkahulugan: suntok, palo, bugbog
Kasalungat: tapik, tulak, dampi
Halimbawa: Hinampas niya ang pinto gamit ang martilyo upang ayusin ito.
usage: In context, 'Bash' can be used like this: He gave the door a bash with the hammer, trying to fix it.

definition: The school decided to ban cell phones during class.
translation:
Ipinagbawal
Kasingkahulugan: ipagbawal, ipatigil, ipahinto
Kasalungat: payagan, pahintulutan, pahintulot
Halimbawa: Nagpasya ang paaralan na ipagbawal ang paggamit ng cellphone sa klase.
usage: In context, 'Ban' can be used like this: The school decided to ban cell phones during class.

definition: The complicated instructions befuddled the new employees.
translation:
Lituhin
Kasingkahulugan: guluhin, lituhin, gulantangin
Kasalungat: ipaliwanag, linawin, payapain
Halimbawa: Nalito ang mga bagong empleyado sa komplikadong tagubilin.
usage: In context, 'Befuddle' can be used like this: The complicated instructions befuddled the new employees.

definition: His anger made his hair bristle with frustration.
translation:
Tindig-Balahibo
Kasingkahulugan: tumayo, manigas, magalit
Kasalungat: mag-relax, lumambot, kukalma
Halimbawa: Tumindig ang kanyang balahibo sa galit.
usage: In context, 'Bristle' can be used like this: His anger made his hair bristle with frustration.

definition: The punishment for breaking the rules was banishment.
translation:
Pagkatapon
Kasingkahulugan: pagpapatalsik, pagpapaalis, deportasyon
Kasalungat: pagbabalik, pagtanggap, pagbabalik-tanaw
Halimbawa: Ang parusa sa krimen ay pagkatapon sa komunidad.
usage: In context, 'Banishment' can be used like this: The punishment for breaking the rules was banishment.

definition: The fisherman used worms as bait to catch the fish.
translation:
Pang-akit
Kasingkahulugan: pain, tukso, panghila
Kasalungat: panglayo, pangtaboy, pang-iwas
Halimbawa: Gumamit ang mangingisda ng bulate bilang pain sa pangingisda.
usage: In context, 'Bait' can be used like this: The fisherman used worms as bait to catch the fish.

definition: He's such a braggart that no one likes to talk to him.
translation:
Mayabang
Kasingkahulugan: palalo, mapagmataas, nagyayabang
Kasalungat: mapagkumbaba, mahinhin, maamo
Halimbawa: Napakayabang niya kaya walang gustong makipag-usap sa kanya.
usage: In context, 'Braggart' can be used like this: He's such a braggart that no one likes to talk to him.

background: Origin: Old English 'befittan', to make suitable
definition: The luxury hotel was a perfect place to befit her status.
translation:
Bagay
Kasingkahulugan: akma, nararapat, tugma
Kasalungat: hindi tugma, salungat, taliwas
Halimbawa: Ang marangyang hotel ay bagay sa kanyang katayuan.
usage: In context, 'Befit' can be used like this: The luxury hotel was a perfect place to befit her status.

definition: The company was sued for a breach of contract.
translation:
Paglabag
Kasingkahulugan: pagkakasala, pagsuway, paglabag
Kasalungat: pagsunod, pagtalima, paggalang
Halimbawa: Dinimanda ang kompanya dahil sa paglabag sa kontrata.
usage: In context, 'Breach' can be used like this: The company was sued for a breach of contract.

definition: He began to bellow in frustration when he couldn't find the keys.
translation:
Sigaw
Kasingkahulugan: hiyaw, bulalas, alulong
Kasalungat: bulong, ungol, pabulong
Halimbawa: Napasigaw siya sa galit nang hindi makita ang kanyang susi.
usage: In context, 'Bellow' can be used like this: He began to bellow in frustration when he couldn't find the keys.

background: Origin: Old French 'betrayer', to deliver up
definition: He felt heartbroken after his best friend betrayed him.
translation:
Ipagkanulo
Kasingkahulugan: linlangin, traydurin, lokohin
Kasalungat: tulungan, ipagtanggol, maging tapat
Halimbawa: Labis ang kanyang sama ng loob nang siya'y ipagkanulo ng matalik na kaibigan.
usage: In context, 'Betray' can be used like this: He felt heartbroken after his best friend betrayed him.

background: Origin: Old French 'bagage', what is carried
definition: She packed all her baggage before heading to the airport.
translation:
Bagahe
Kasingkahulugan: maleta, gamit, dalahin
Kasalungat: wala (depende sa gamit)
Halimbawa: Ipinakete niya ang lahat ng kanyang bagahe bago pumunta sa paliparan.
usage: In context, 'Baggage' can be used like this: She packed all her baggage before heading to the airport.

definition: He became the target of a bully at school who took his lunch money.
translation:
Mang-api
Kasingkahulugan: manakot, mang-asar, manggulpi
Kasalungat: ipagtanggol, protektahan, tulungan
Halimbawa: Naging biktima siya ng mang-aapi na kumukuha ng kanyang baon sa paaralan.
usage: In context, 'Bully' can be used like this: He became the target of a bully at school who took his lunch money.

background: Origin: Latin 'coraticus' (via Old French), relating to bravery
definition: The courageous soldier saved his comrades under heavy fire.
translation:
Matapang
Kasingkahulugan: matapang, magiting, walang takot
Kasalungat: duwag, takot, mahiyain
Halimbawa: Ang matapang na sundalo ay iniligtas ang kanyang mga kasama sa gitna ng putukan.
usage: In context, 'Courageous' can be used like this: The courageous soldier saved his comrades under heavy fire.

background: Origin: Old English 'clǣfre', quick to understand
definition: His clever solution to the problem impressed everyone.
translation:
Matalino
Kasingkahulugan: matalino, madiskarte, marunong
Kasalungat: mangmang, hangal, inosente
Halimbawa: Ang matalinong solusyon niya sa problema ay ikinamangha ng lahat.
usage: In context, 'Clever' can be used like this: His clever solution to the problem impressed everyone.

background: Origin: uncertain, related to lacking coordination
definition: She felt clumsy as she tripped over the chair.
translation:
Tulad ng walang kilos
Kasingkahulugan: awkward, uncoordinated, graceless
Kasalungat: graceful, coordinated, agile
Halimbawa: Nahulog siya sa upuan dahil sa pagiging clumsy niya.
usage: In context, 'Clumsy' can be used like this: She felt clumsy as she tripped over the chair.

definition: The cautious driver slowed down when the weather became foggy.
translation:
Maingat
Kasingkahulugan: maingat, mapanuri, mapagmatyag
Kasalungat: pabaya, padalos-dalos, walang ingat
Halimbawa: Ang maingat na drayber ay bumagal nang maging mahamog ang daan.
usage: In context, 'Cautious' can be used like this: The cautious driver slowed down when the weather became foggy.

definition: He was a charming host who made everyone feel welcome.
translation:
Kaakit-akit
Kasingkahulugan: nakakaaliw, kahali-halina, may karisma
Kasalungat: hindi kaaya-aya, bastos, walang dating
Halimbawa: Siya ay isang kaakit-akit na host na nagparamdam ng ginhawa sa lahat.
usage: In context, 'Charming' can be used like this: He was a charming host who made everyone feel welcome.

definition: The child was curious about the world around him and asked a lot of questions.
translation:
Palaisip
Kasingkahulugan: mausisa, interesado, sabik matuto
Kasalungat: walang pakialam, hindi interesado, malamig
Halimbawa: Ang bata ay palaisip tungkol sa mundo at madalas magtanong.
usage: In context, 'Curious' can be used like this: The child was curious about the world around him and asked a lot of questions.

definition: It was a chilly morning, so I grabbed my jacket before heading out.
translation:
Malamig
Kasingkahulugan: malamig, presko, maginaw
Kasalungat: mainit, maalinsangan, maalab
Halimbawa: Maginaw ang umaga kaya nagsuot ako ng jacket bago umalis.
usage: In context, 'Chilly' can be used like this: It was a chilly morning, so I grabbed my jacket before heading out.

definition: It took a lot of courage to speak in front of such a large crowd.
translation:
Tapang
Kasingkahulugan: bravery, fortitude, valor
Kasalungat: fear, cowardice, timidity
Halimbawa: Kinailangan ng malaking tapang para magsalita sa harap ng malaking madla.
usage: In context, 'Courage' can be used like this: It took a lot of courage to speak in front of such a large crowd.

definition: His cynical attitude made it hard for him to believe in others' goodwill.
translation:
Mapangduda
Kasingkahulugan: distrustful, skeptical, doubtful
Kasalungat: trusting, hopeful, optimistic
Halimbawa: Dahil sa kanyang mapangdudang ugali, hirap siyang maniwala sa kabutihan ng iba.
usage: In context, 'Cynical' can be used like this: His cynical attitude made it hard for him to believe in others' goodwill.

definition: She was a compassionate nurse who always took extra time with her patients.

Kasingkahulugan: pangit, nakakatakot, masama
Kasalungat: maganda, kahanga-hanga, mahusay
Halimbawa: Napakapangit ng pelikula—hindi ko man lang natapos.
usage: That movie was awful—I couldn’t even finish it.

definition: The concert was absolutely awesome.
translation:
Kamangha-mangha
Kasingkahulugan: kahanga-kanga, nakakabilib, kamangha-mangha
Kasalungat: boring, hindi kahanga-hanga, mapurol
Halimbawa: Napakaganda ng konsiyerto, talaga ngang kamangha-mangha!
usage: The concert was absolutely awesome.

definition: The austere design of the building reflected its serious purpose.
translation:
Mahigpit
Kasingkahulugan: disiplinado, seryoso, matipid
Kasalungat: maluwag, malambot, mapagparaya
Halimbawa: Ang simpleng disenyo ng gusali ay sumasalamin sa seryosong layunin nito.
usage: The austere design of the building reflected its serious purpose.

definition: The team's performance was average this season.
translation:
Karaniwan
Kasingkahulugan: normal, pangkaraniwan, tipikal
Kasalungat: pambihira, natatangi, higit sa karaniwan
Halimbawa: Karaniwan lang ang naging performance ng koponan ngayong season.
usage: The team's performance was average this season.

definition: The loud noise awakened me from a deep sleep.
translation:
Magising
Kasingkahulugan: magmulat, magpukaw, matauhan
Kasalungat: matulog, managinip, mapahinga
Halimbawa: Ginising ako ng malakas na ingay mula sa mahimbing na tulog.
usage: The loud noise awakened me from a deep sleep.

definition: He failed to acknowledge his mistake in front of the team.
translation:
Kilalanin
Kasingkahulugan: aminin, tanggapin, kilalanin
Kasalungat: itanggi, balewalain, isantabi
Halimbawa: Hindi niya kinilala ang kanyang pagkakamali sa harap ng grupo.
usage: He failed to acknowledge his mistake in front of the team.

definition: His aggressive behavior at the meeting was unprofessional.
translation:
Mapusok
Kasingkahulugan: marahas, palaban, matindi
Kasalungat: kalmado, mahinahon, mapayapa
Halimbawa: Ang kanyang mapusok na asal sa pagpupulong ay hindi propesyonal.
usage: His aggressive behavior at the meeting was unprofessional.

definition: I really admire her dedication to her craft.
translation:
Humanga
Kasingkahulugan: pahalagahan, igalang, sambahin
Kasalungat: kamuhian, hindi gusto, suklamin
Halimbawa: Talagang humahanga ako sa kanyang dedikasyon sa trabaho.
usage: I really admire her dedication to her craft.

definition: Testing_Word
usage: Testing_Word
